summary: Displaced Sri Lankans in a Vizag port are ruled by a local rowdy. This is the story of Chatrapati Sivaji who overcomes this oppression and how he reunites with his long lost mother and brother.
cast: Prabhas|Bhanupriya|Shriya Saran|Shafi|Pradeep Singh Rawat|Jayaprakash Reddy|Srinivasa Rao Kota|Mumait Khan|Aarthi Agarwal|Narendhra Jha|Venu Madhav|Ajay|Joy Badlani|Jeeva|Narendra Jha|Karate Kalyani|Kamal Kamaraju|S.S. Kanchi|Teja Sajja|Chandra Sekhar|Stunt Silva|Supreet|Surya
title: Chatrapathi
